/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades adorned with red and white accents that add a vibrant contrast to the blue sky above. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene. A red car can be seen driving down the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The image beautifully encapsulates the hustle and bustle of city life in Beijing.
